A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Though I do agree with many of the critiques\, I do believe that this movie is worth so much more than a 57%. It has great humor\, amazing fighting sequences\, interesting character development\, and unforgettable plot-twists. Sure\, there are some unnecessary scenes and some weird characters *cough*cough*porgs*cough* but it was an enjoyable movie. I was on the edge of my seat. It's worth the watch. Mark gives an astounding performance and Carrie Fisher is a living legend in this movie. If for any other reason to see this movie\, go because of Carrie and Mark.
